_sText:
surf_skybears

Link to the lighted version of this map. Be carefull !! This map is made for normal surf servers + RPG. Certainly NOT for DM. Noblock required ! Currently hosted at #ENi RPG Surf maps - 81.171.114.127:27018 Gameplay: Ct's and t's spawn at each side of spawn without any weapons: There are 3 ways to surf: At the noob way, there's a cannon: You just need to walk in the loop and it fires you! Can't be easier^^ When you are shot, you get a knife. Now we have the Pro way, it's hard to surf but fast. The extreme way are 3 stages + bonus After 6 minutes, everyone in here will be teleported to jail and the jail teleport will be disabled. And when you teleport, you get one of these weapons: stage 1 - Knife stage 2 - deagle stage 3 - shotgun stage 4 - m4a1 Stage 1 Stage 2 Stage 3 (The bonus is rather fun to surf) There's also a small secret at the end of the bonus. And in that secret you can set the next round to 'knives only'! I made a tutorial about this: TUTORIAL WARNING:May fail if there's a RPG or DM mod installed on the server Please enjoy!
Credits: Made by: Mapper And is made possible by the ENi-community and Mirror Map Studios.(especially AmstaFF) I also credit Fpsbanana for some prefabs. The letters -> !Black The waterfall -> kEn_sct The moving cannon -> Alec The watertunnel -> Mr.White Next round knife -> Roosta, Teeth Some ramps -> ryan sterner
I made a demo with windows media player, there are some difficulties, i will maybe add this later.
